# UpdateAutoSignInTokenRequest

**Object**

The request body that contains the old sign-in token and the new sign-in token.

## Declaration

```swift
object UpdateAutoSignInTokenRequest
```

## Overview

This is the request object for the [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/AutomaticSignInAPI/Update-this-token-for-all-associated-users] endpoint.

## Token updates

- **Update Sign-In Token**: Updates a specific sign-in token to a new value.

items.description: Updates a specific sign-in token to a new value.
